name: Colin McCahon
biographicalInformation: Colin John McCahon was a prominent artist in New Zealand. Along with Toss Woollaston and Rita Angus, he is credited for introducing modernism to New Zealand art in the early twentieth century.

name: Rita Angus
biographicalInformation: Rita Angus (12 March 1908 â€“ 25 January 1970), known as Rita McKenzie after 1941, was a New Zealand painter. Along with Colin McCahon and Toss Woollaston, she is credited as one of the leading figures in twentieth century New Zealand art.
